costs.description: Flight from Bali to Raja Ampat
Flight from Raja Ampat to Palau
Flight from Borneo to Kuala Lumpur
Flight from Kuala Lumpur to Taiwan

costs.notes: Prices for 3 people can be higher due to limited triple rooms; booking two separate rooms might be an alternative. Booking in advance is recommended, especially for mid-range and luxury options. Airbnb can offer more space for groups at a potentially lower cost than hotels, but prices vary greatly. (Estimates based on 7 nights for 3 people)

Estimates are for 3 people for 7 days. Eating at local eateries, convenience stores, and street food stalls can significantly reduce costs. Mid-range includes a mix of casual restaurants and some nicer meals. High-end includes frequent dining at more expensive restaurants.

costs.description: Local transport in Tokyo (7 days, 3 people)
costs.notes: Estimates are for 3 people for 7 days. Purchasing a Tokyo Subway Ticket can offer significant savings. Walking is also a great way to explore. Taxis are expensive, especially for longer distances.

Estimates are for 3 people for 7 days. Many temples, shrines, and parks are free to enter. Consider purchasing a Tokyo Pass for discounts on multiple attractions. Booking popular tours or experiences in advance is recommended.

Flight estimates are for a round trip from Los Angeles (LAX) to Tokyo (NRT/HND) for 3 travelers. Prices can vary significantly based on origin city, booking time, and seasonality. Booking 2-6 months in advance is recommended.
